title.rendered: The Right Lash Look: Natural or Glam?

content.rendered:
You’re unique. You have your own style, your own look, and your own individualized approach to life. With that in mind, why would you ever want to choose lash extensions based on anyone else’s style? You deserve to have extensions that accentuate the real you, maximizing your own personal beauty rather than transforming you into a carbon copy of someone else. To accomplish that personalized look, however, you need to decide which eyelash extensions offer the right lash look for you: natural or glam? The right choice will ensure that your lashes always look their fabulous best.

Before you decide, however, it’s important to get a better understanding of how each look is achieved. In the end, it’s usually a matter of choosing the right length, curl, and volume to create that unique look that’s right for you. So, without further ado, let’s review the options:

The Natural Look

This look is perfect for the woman who wants a more understated eyelash beauty enhancement. You want to dazzle everyone around you but do it in a subtler way. That usually means a little less volume, a more natural lash length, and a gentle, natural curl. Typically, a natural look application will require fewer extensions than the glam option. Yes, you’ll get more length a reliable curl too – but your lashes won’t be so thick that it looks like you’re wearing several coats of mascara.

The natural look is the perfect choice for women who want lash extensions that fly a little bit under the radar. Yes, your close friends and family will probably notice that you’re wearing them – but only because they see you every day. In general, nobody else will ever likely give them a second thought, other than to notice that your lashes look perfect.

Going for the Glam

The glam option is another matter altogether. Unlike the natural look, the glam lash extension option offers a more dramatic aesthetic. This is for the woman who wants all eyes on her when she walks into a room. She wants perfect lashes that stand out in a crown, with added flare, length, volume, and noticeable curl. Have you ever wanted to look like a movie star stepping out onto the red carpet for a Hollywood event? Then these lashes are for you!

To get the glam look, your lash technician will add even more volume by attaching extensions to even more of your natural lashes. Slightly longer lashes will be chosen, and the end result will be similar to what you could achieve with two or more coats of carefully-applied mascara. In short, you’ll be glamorous, mysterious, and certain to capture everyone’s attention.

A good lash technician will work with you to help you make the choice, consulting with you about your natural lash health, eye shape, and beauty goals. In the end, though, the eyelash extension choice you make should be one that you’re happy to live with for the life of your lashes. Natural or glam – which is right for you?
